radirius.merc.audio

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • radirius.merc.audio.Audio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Resource

    public class Audio
extends Object
implements Resource
    An object for loading and using sounds.
    Author:
    wessles

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns:
        Whether or not the clip is playing.

      • play

        public Audio play()
        Plays the clip. If it is already playing, it will restart. If the clip is paused, it will continue.
        Returns:
        Me

      • togglePause

        public Audio togglePause()
        Plays the clip if it is paused, pauses it if it is not paused.
        Returns:
        Me

      • toggleStop

        public Audio toggleStop()
        Plays the clip if it is stopped, stops it if it is not stopped.
        Returns:
        Me

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Returns:
        Whether or not the clip is paused.

      • pause

        public Audio pause()
        Pauses the clip. Reversible by play().
        Returns:
        Me

        Returns:

        Stops the clip.

        public float getVolume()
        Returns:
        The volume of the clip.

      • setVolume

        public Audio setVolume(float vol)
        Sets the volume of the clip.
        Parameters:
        vol - A floating point volume value, 0.8 being 80%, 1.5 being 150%, etc.
        Returns:
        Me

      • getAudio

        public static Audio getAudio(IntBuffer buf)
        Makes a source based off of buf, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.
        Parameters:
        buf - The integer buffer of the sound for OpenAL to process.
        Returns:
        Me

      • getOGGBuffer

        public static IntBuffer getOGGBuffer(InputStream is)
        Forms a buffer from is.
        Parameters:
        is - The stream to the sound file.
        Returns:
        The integer buffer for OpenAL based off of the .ogg file at the InputStream is.

      • getWAVBuffer

        public static IntBuffer getWAVBuffer(InputStream is)
        Froms a buffer from is.
        Parameters:
        is - The stream to the sound file.
        Returns:
        The integer buffer for OpenAL based off of the .wav file at the InputStream is.
